snippet.title: Blade and Sorcery | Official Update 10 Trailer - The Dungeons Update
snippet.description:
Finally, U10 is upon us. Official Trailer for Blade & Sorcery Update 10, the early awaited "Dungeons" update. U10 will be available Oct 24!

🍺 Buy The Baron a beer! - https://streamlabs.com/thebaron3

➤ Game Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/629730/Blade_and_Sorcery
➤ Discord: https://discord.gg/vPy2BTt

➤ Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thebaronreviews
➤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheBaronReviews
➤ Steam Reviews: http://steamcommunity.com/id/thebaron/recommended
➤ Curator Page: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/thebaronreviews#curation

#theBaron #VR #BladeAndSorcery
